items.headline: Nio’s stock recoups losses as Wall Street assesses a shareholder suit. What to know.
items.summary_en: Nio was sued by Singapore’s sovereign wealth fund over claims the Chinese electric-vehicle maker juiced its numbers.

items.headline: Lithium Americas is deemed vital by Trump, but investors beware, J.P. Morgan says
items.summary_en: Lithium Americas Corp. saw its stock surge recently after the federal government took a stake in the company, but J.P. Morgan warns that investors should not get carried away with the the lithium producer’s newfound popularity in Washington.

items.headline: Why record cash in money-market funds won’t necessarily flood into stocks, bonds
items.summary_en: The record amount of cash in money-market funds isn’t about to flood into riskier assets in the stock and bond markets — despite the Federal Reserve recently resuming its interest-rate-cutting cycle, according to research from J.P. Morgan.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: A major lender wants to turn mortgages into rewards points. Here’s why you should think twice.
items.summary_en: United Wholesale Mortgage is teaming up with Bilt to offer rewards points — part of a broader push by lenders to attract scarce borrowers.

items.headline: Did Salesforce finally prove the bears wrong? The stock is rising off an upbeat AI forecast.
items.summary_en: Salesforce guided for $60 billion in revenue by fiscal 2030, igniting optimism about the company’s AI-monetization strategy.

items.headline: Jerome Powell may have just given stock investors a new reason to be worried

items.headline: Trump rolls out his latest deal with a drugmaker. This one stems from his campaign promise to cover all IVF costs.
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump on Thursday announced a deal with EMD Serono, a subsidiary of German drugmaker Merck KGaA, that aims to cut the out-of-pocket costs for in vitro fertilization, with the move coming more than a year after his campaign promise to eliminate all such costs for the fertility treatment.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Praxis Precision’s tremor-drug trial succeeds where others have failed. The stock is skyrocketing.

items.headline: Oracle’s stock rises as Wall Street’s AI profitability concerns are put to rest
items.summary_en: The tech giant raised its long-term financial targets and projected strong cloud margins, reassuring investors that its massive AI spending spree is on a path to profitability
